thread.title: We Need To Talk About How Sayani Gupta Is Having Some Major Fashion Moments
thread.title_full: We Need To Talk About How Sayani Gupta Is Having Some Major Fashion Moments

title: We Need To Talk About How Sayani Gupta Is Having Some Major Fashion Moments
text: facebook In the shadow of Bollywood A-listers like Sonam, Deepika and Priyanka, we sometimes miss out on a lot of rising stars that definitely need our attention, both in terms of their movie performances and also their fashion sensibilities. One such blooming fashonista that we seem to have completely missed out on is Sayani Gupta (pronounced Shyoni) of Margarita with a Straw , Jolly LLB2, Fan, Parched and Jagga Jasos fame. There is no doubt that she is one of the best actors from the younger lot we have today, but right now we are going to talk about the bold fashion choices she keeps making. She may not be a big heroine or a star kid but she definitely knows a thing or two about fashion. Here you go! 1. One think this girl loves, is to keep it bold. Clashing different prints together is her favourite! A post shared by Shyoni (@sayanigupta) on Feb 24, 2017 at 12:10am PST 2.Looks like if she could adopt one avatar for life, it would be the school-girl fashionista. Earlier today for @aldo_shoes new line launch Again with my minions @shreejarajgopal & @sahithya.shetty doing what they do best. Make me look presentable. A post shared by Shyoni (@sayanigupta) on Sep 2, 2016 at 1:10pm PDT @shreejarajgopal Thank you my lovely! @cloverwootton I want to attach a chain to you so you are always with me! ðŸ’‹ðŸ’‹In @ankitachoksey & @aldo A post shared by Shyoni (@sayanigupta) on Feb 22, 2017 at 4:16am PST A post shared by Shyoni (@sayanigupta) on Sep 21, 2016 at 12:07pm PDT 3. Her love for unconventional and bold, very bold designs is never-ending.
